scripts.update:adapter: npm run update:adapter:js && npm run update:adapter:ts && npm run update:adapter:gherkin
scripts.update:cypress: npm run update:cypress:js && npm run update:cypress:ts && npm run update:cypress:gherkin
scripts.install:all: npm run install:packages:js && npm run install:packages:ts && npm run install:packages:gherkin
scripts.cy:js: cd examples/cypress-js && npm run cy:run || true && npm run cp
scripts.cy:gherkin: cd examples/cypress-js-gherkin && npm run cy:run || true && npm run cp
scripts.cy:ts: cd examples/cypress-ts && npm run cy:run || true && npm run cp
scripts.cy:all: rm -rf allure-results allure-report && npm run cy:js || true && npm run cy:gherkin || true && npm run cy:ts || true
scripts.cy:run:with:report: (npm run cy:all || true) && npm run report:open
scripts.pages:update: (npm run cy:all || true) && mv -f docs/history allure-results/history || true && npm run report:generate -- --clean && rm -rf docs && cp -R allure-report docs
scripts.pages:build:and:update: npm run build && npm run pages:update
scripts.report:history: mv -f docs/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
